projects.name: History Viz Thing
projects.technologies: Chrome Extension, JS, REST, Crome API's, D3
projects.role: Team leader - coordinated group activities and communication in addition to programming repsonsibilities.

projects.name: Simulating Particle Flocking
projects.description: Demo of physically-based simulation of flocking particles. The simulation, from maintaining state vectors to step-approximation, was done myself. We were given leeway on how to demonstrate flocking, so I used TIE Fighters instead of birds.
projects.technologies: Physically based simulation hand-coded in Javascript; 3D with Three.js.

demo.requires: Runs best in Google Chrome for Desktop. Textures do not load in Safari.
